name: You Better Run!
description:
This is a short horror game that takes place in an unnamed building. All you have is a flashlight. Is something following you? You better get out of here before you find out.

IMPORTANT:
This is the first game I have ever made. I just started learning how to make games in Unity and using C# so any feedback and/or suggestions that can help me improve and make better games in the future is much appreciated.

The game is free-to-play and will always be, since it is my first game. However donations are very appreciated!

//PureToxic
